title: Artistic Duplex Haven for Inspired Students in Sopot's Karlikowo
description: Experience modern dual-level living in this spacious duplex, crafted creatively for comfort and style. Spanning 115 sqm, the home boasts three bright bedrooms and two contemporary bathrooms, ideal for sharing or basking in personal space. An open-plan living area paired with floor-to-ceiling windows invites the beautiful mountain backdrop indoors, while clever architectural lines keep inspiration flowing. Enjoy a seamless blend of functionality and artistry across both custom-designed levels.
neighborhood_description: Located in Karlikowo—a neighborhood alive with local charm—this address is at the heart of Sopot’s creative pulse. Village cafes, vibrant shops, and a medley of dining havens are a stroll away, as is public transit and responsive bike infrastructure. Karlikowo offers rare mountain views just moments from lively urban scenes and major city connections, promising culture at your doorstep and adventure on your horizon.
lifestyle_benefits: close to shopping, cafes, and nightlife
target_buyer: Designed for students and young creatives seeking a vibrant, flexible, and social environment at the intersection of nature and city living.
market_positioning: Standing out as a rare synergy of style and practicality, this property fills a growing demand for upscale, shared student accommodation near transport and leisure, positioning it as an outstanding investment or lifestyle choice for both personal living and student rentals.
